name: Golden Corral Buffet & Grill
address: 2375 E Tremont Ave, Bronx, NY 10462, USA

reviews.text: Orlando was the best brought me every coke I wanted n needed mi finace loves youre rolls thanks !

My Overall Experience Was Not What I was expecting  My Server Was AD Was Barely Seen at all To clear tables or attend to us The Food  Is Not As Good As It Use To Be They Promote a lot of Opinions such as wings etc But either don‚Äôt have or  Run Of The items I  Spent 34.00 on 2 plates of mash Potatoes and chicken thanks  for something I could of done at home 2-10 for me Don‚Äôt Recommend AT ALLL . Especially DINNER !!
Todo muy delicioso y un muy buen ambiente familiar.
Yvette was an excellent server!!!
Eva Iis a very nice respectful person, really like how she approaches her customers
Raf made the evening spectacular! He was attentive, kind and overall had amazing energy!
Gus has the best energy and he‚Äôs so nice and helpful restaurant has great food and all staff are nice is clean and family friendly and affordable good for all
The service was very nice my kids and I enjoyed the food and will be coming back we had Gus and Raphael as services and they were both very nice

Surprisingly wonderful experience; so glad they had a fair amount of vegetable options along with American standard fare.

Orlando was attentive as our server.

At $13.99 for lunch, it‚Äôs very easy to recommend Golden Corral.

I loved it here! This was my first time ever at a Golden Corral and it was a 10/10 experience. There were multiple food options, and each item was replaced immediately.
THE YEAST ROLLS WERE TO DIE FORRRRR. The ribs were tasty.
I will definitely be coming back.

Excellent service!  AD and GEO Very polite and kind! Kept a positive vibe throughout the entire time. Birthday song led by Gus was very energetic and made the birthday girl feel special.
AD & Gio are amazing and Goose can sing a good happy birthday
AG & Gio was great made my fam welcomed and Gustavo made my mom birthday song a hit 5 out of 5 stars service and food

She made sure everything came out perfectly and checked in just the right amount. The food was delicious, and the overall service made the visit even better. I‚Äôd definitely recommend coming here and would absolutely go back again!
New to golden coral, very good food service, definitely will be back and Perla are waitress was very nice ans did a great job taking care of us
Had a great experience at this place ! The food was amazing and there was a great variety to choose from. AD and Gio were very attentive and kind! Definitely made the overall experience even better

Chasity thank you for your attention. I appreciate your care during our visit!. Thank you so much.

Gio and AD give us an amazing service, we were so happy with the way they treated us, they should serve as an example on how to work in the customer service industry.
Real good the food was amazing. And Ad and Gio were so tuff and the service was amazing from them.

Service was good, AD and Moe were good. Food was alright. Some of the dishes had too much salt. Atmosphere was not too bad, the tables were small to accommodate a group of eight.

Food has an artificial flavor,  it taste like hospital meals. Not a place I will want to visit often. The Atmosphere feels like a dirty dinner. Not bad if you don't know quality.
I will recommend visiting Mon-Fri around lunch, food quality is more eatable, less people and server's are fresh???

Gus was our server today. Hard worker. Very attentive and friendly! Not one min pass that boy wasn‚Äôt helping someone or cleaning up. Susan was also very friendly and helpful. Amazing duo! The food was great as always!

The food was just ok. Not much variety to work with. Music was great. Atmosphere wasn‚Äôt rowdy. Our server JHASSI was amazing and respectful. She made sure we were ok and if we needed anything for the entire time we were there. She was a sweetheart if you can request her. And please tip her well she works hard. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è
I‚Äôve been to Golden Corrals around the country and this one was actually one of the best I‚Äôve experienced. Great variety. Definitely recommend for anyone hungry out there!

Jessica was our waiter and she was attentive polite and friendly. She was always on time with seconds. We love Golden Coral , thank you üòä we celebrated our baby 14th birthday üéâ here we always feel great and leave happier.

Amazing time and great food! Jess is the best server and super sweet! She attended to us and answered any questions we had. Def recommend having her serve you during your time here
Also Georgina at the front welcomed us with the biggest smile and is a gem! It was our first time ever going to this restaurant and she explained everything to us and helped my family to their seats. Both these girls need a raise!

Will be coming back soon

The restaurant is great! I went with some friends for lunch and the food was fresh and they continuously restocked the food. There‚Äôs a good variety of options and the service was very good. Our employee, Orlando, was great at taking care of our refills and clearing our table. He was kind and courteous. Lastly, there‚Äôs a parking lot for the restaurant, so you don‚Äôt have to worry about street parking. Overall, a very pleasant experience.
hiii, okay basically food is very yummy and my server does it every single time, yes the sweetest, his name is Orlando and he‚Äôs so cool dudeee

The food was absolutely DELICIOUS! Probably the best Golden Corral I‚Äôve been too in forever. The food was hot, fresh and flavorful and our waiter, Mohammed was very courteous, attentive and sweet. Will definitely be coming back very soon : )

First and foremost I have been wanting to visit for years. It was better and. More beautiful than I expected. The RIBS OMG everything was great part of my happiest days of the year so far. Gustavo was amazing attendant. He made us feel comfortable. Will return to taste the other menus.

Cody and angel gave us an amazing experience the minute, we walked in they greeted us with a smile attended at to what we need. They keeps coming back to make sure we are comfortable and to make sure we got drinks or we need refill . He was awesome! We‚Äôre driving all the way from Brentwood in Long Island to eat here so great hospitality is always a good feeling to have good service when you walk into a restaurant

I had a great experience at Bronx Golden Corral! The buffet was clean, well-stocked, and had a wide variety of options‚Äîfrom fresh salads and hot comfort foods to made-to-order steaks and a solid dessert section. The staff was super friendly and attentive, constantly making sure everything was fresh and the dining area stayed clean. It‚Äôs a great spot for family outings or even just grabbing a hearty meal solo. Definitely one of the better buffet experiences I‚Äôve had in the Bronx! OH LAWD

The food is always delicious, and Meyon served us super well. She was very friendly. She was always attentive to whether we needed drinks and even took our plates away when we arrived.
You have to request your table and pay, without forgetting to order your drink. Everything here is full of delicious food and desserts. Every event of the month, like Christmas, Easter, and New Year's, is very well decorated. It's clean and super beautiful.
They also sing your birthday or special date to you. It's a truly great place. I often go there to eat.

La comida siempre esta deliciosa y Meyon
Nos atendi√≥ super bien es muy amable
Siempre estuvo atenta de si nececitamos bebida y llego a llevarse los platos, al llegar
Tienes que pedir tu mesa y pagar sin olvidar ordenar tu bebida, todo aqu√≠ est√° lleno de comida y postres deliciosos cada evento del mes como Navidad,Pascua,A√±o nuevo esta muy bien decorado, Esta limpio y super bello
Tambi√©n te cantan tu cumplea√±os o fecha especial, Es realmente un Gran lugar a menudo voy a comer all√≠

Jhassi   she's the  good waitress . I enjoy the time in this restaurant. I was well served. The service was perfect with her.

We had such a wonderful time at Golden Corral! The food was excellent‚Äîfresh, flavorful, and with plenty of variety to choose from. But what truly made the experience stand out was the service. Our server, Rafael, went above and beyond in every way. He was warm, attentive, and made sure we had everything we needed without ever having to ask. His friendliness and professionalism really elevated the entire dining experience. Rafael didn‚Äôt just serve us‚Äîhe made us feel welcome, valued, and cared for. Golden Corral is lucky to have someone like him on their team.

We‚Äôve been coming here since they opened a few years ago, and it never disappoints. Geo was extremely attentive and I must say, she‚Äôs probably one of the fastest when it comes to drink refills - even when it‚Äôs busy. The food is always fresh (I‚Äôm a bit biased towards the fried chicken), and there‚Äôs typically a nice selection. Will continue to come back!

Our server Uni was on point with what she does best. I will recommend this place based on what I received. If servers are like her this place we be untouchable and a lot more people will come. Thanks Uni once again and for also taken a family picture of our table.

A lot of people here enjoying themselves I saw a wedding party. If you didn't know Golden corral is a buffet with American food. I was most excited about the dessert section. The banana pudding was the best The fudge tastes like frozen chocolate frosting. The fried Chicken was very well cooked and very flavorful. Everything I tasted was fresh. We definitely recommend and will return there soon.

I had a wonderful experience at Golden Corral. Cody was my server and he was amazing! He had excellent hospitality. He was very kind, attentive and made sure he cleared off our table right away. My experience was a 10/10. Thank you!!

Todos somos felices yendo a este lugar, mucha variedad y comes hasta que ya no, como sugerencia me gustar√≠a ver m√°s mariscos en los buffet pero de ah√≠ todo est√° bien. El personal siempre muy amable en esta ocasi√≥n nos atendi√≥ Perla que no brind√≥ una mejor experiencia porque habla ingl√©s y espa√±ol. Gracias por todo linda!
Top notch services! Jhassi did a great job! The food was hot fresh and enough of a normal variety to satisfy everyone‚Äôs tummy. All the food was clean and there are places
It was great experience especially taking my wife on dinner date this past Friday. We will definitely come back again plus the Miami vice and mango margarita taste great.
Because raphael was patient and helpful to my family I ordered more food, but this is the last place that I had

I only give reviews for 1 of 2 reasons : bad service or exceptional service. Fortunately this review falls in the latter category. My server IMHO was exceptional and made sure my party of 3 were catered to with top tier service. He was very personable and attentive.
The food was delicious, hot and tasty. Everything I ate was to my liking.
The atmosphere was very welcoming and curated to accommodate all types of guests.
I look forward to my next visit and hope to see IMHO again!

I must say I came in at first with hesitation about how the services n food would be but when I came in with my family we was so surprised on how great everything was. Clean, courteous, and full of good taste. Our server Dee was very helpful and attentive to our table, he made sure to clean our table in good timing and refilled on time. We was also happy to see a long time server still working here from when sizzlers was here. Such a great person and an overall good worker.

Just wanted to send a quick shoutout about my recent visit to the Golden Corral location on 10/25/25. Everything was great food, atmosphere etc, especially the service. Our server, Gus, was super friendly and made sure we had everything we needed. Thanks again Golden Corral & Gus !! Much appreciation.

Pretty standard layout with an active grill house for variety of meats. Lots of vege options but also lots of meats( ribs and carne asada were my fav), rice is a little undercooked and limited fruit options but overall a great place with lots of options. Our sever Perla was amazing, very kind, sweet and welcoming.

5 stars

Yo‚ÄîPerla at Golden Corral is legit. From the jump she greeted us with a big smile and ran through the buffet like a pro. Drinks never ran dry, plates cleared fast, and she kept checking in without being up in our grill. Gave great recs (even for the picky kids) and handled a crazy busy night like it was chill. Super friendly, mad efficient, and made the whole night way better. Ask for Perla‚Äîshe‚Äôs the real MVP.
The food was really good the staff is very friendly temperature of food was good the restaurant was clean
Eva outstanding waitress.. gave Birthday üéÇ greetings to about 5  guests.. they absolutely love her...

Mr. Angel has such a warm welcome, very patient, and understanding. Pleasant in his communication. I truly appreciate him , he served me with kindness and patience. His attentiveness made my meal so much more enjoyable and comfortable. I am grateful for his excellent service and warm hospitality.

Orlando , the server, is so attentive and kind. He brought us refills amd was constantly cleaning up our table. For $40, 3 of us ate and shared a great lunch. My favorite is the yeast rolls and the banana bread pudding with vanilla ice cream! The food was hot and constantly being refilled. Last time I was here was for a work meeting in the private room and they did not disappoint.  Thank you Orlando and the rest of the GC crew!!!

My experience at Golden Corral was honestly the best I‚Äôve had in a long time. From the moment I walked in, everything felt welcoming, but what really made it special was my server, Georgina. She went above and beyond she was sweet, patient, and very attentive. She never made me feel rushed, always checked in with a smile, and truly took her time to make sure I had everything I needed. Good customer service is hard to come by these days, but Georgina made my visit memorable. If anyone decides to eat here, I highly recommend asking for Georgina you won‚Äôt be disappointed!
Rafael was the best server we had 13 parties and he was amazing he kept checking on us making sure our party was great he needs the biggest reward

Gustavo was a great waiter.  Courteous and friendly.  Food was plentiful.  The only downer about this place is the cleanliness of the bathroom.  They were filthy with toilet paper all over the floor.  Other than that, it's a great place to eat with your family for a great price.

Jailiene was a very good server, she came around to all of her customers and always asked if everything is okay and if we want any refills consantly. Great server! And I love the choice of the location for here, to have a Golden Corral in NYC.

My server was amazing! very attentive and professional. He had amazing energy and it shows he takes pride in his job. He was singing happy birthday to another table and we all clapped along, he just brought an inviting and enthusiastic experience to my family‚Äôs stay. He was great, my daughter wanted to inlucde that she would want her birthday here just so he could sing to her.  5 stars to Gustavo best server I‚Äôve had ever!!

Our waiter Mayon did excellent! I really appreciated her timely manner assistance and her professionalism. She went above and beyond with serving out table, very attentive and just overall 1# in excellence !!! This is why our family loves Golden Corral! Because of employees like her. Truly appreciate her!! üíóüíóüíóüíóüíó
Muy bien puedes ir en confianza vallan en familia difrutaran mucho cr√©ame y su buen precio razonable todo organizado y limpio

The food is delicious.  The personal, warm welcome by Cody and the gracious, first-class service by Gustavo was suitable for the finest restaurants in Manhattan.  The experience exceeded all expectations.   The fried okra could have been improved, but otherwise 5 stars.

The service was great. Some staff weren't as friendly as others but everyone was well organized and worked together efficiently. Service at the table was very quick.
The food was better than you'd expect from a buffet. Not every item was a hit, but a few of the dishes were actually pretty great. They had a homecooked feel. The Pot Roast was amazing, as well as the pulled pork and ribs. The bourbon chicken tasted like cheap teriyaki. The salad bar was neat and well stocked and the desserts were charming. Would recommend for a cheap way to fill up with a big meal when you don't quite know what to choose. Our server, Angel, was very attentive and quick. He made sure we had everything we needed.
Gus was our main man today! So attentive and sweet!!! Quick with the clean up and always had a smile, and funny too! Staff plays a major role in the experience and Gus made it an enjoyable one!
Meyon was a great server she was very attentive and answered the questions I had about if something was pork or beef. I would definitely request her again.
Have a great dinner with my mom. Our waiter Cody was fast and wonderful as well as super friendly/helpful would definitely recommend to come again
Always great service and Orlando is great at his job. The food is fresh and they keep it very clean. Orlando kept our glasses full and picked up the dishes in a timely manner.

This place has a lovely design. The servers were approachable and helpful in a well-kept restaurant. You'll appreciate the difference proper ingredients make. The service team demonstrated professionalism that exceeded all others. I genuinely liked this place and will certainly be back!

Well this is our second time around so clearly we love it. The staff is great, friendly and attentive. Our server for today was MIA, she‚Äôs so sweet. Last visit our server was AD, he‚Äôs great. He was here today and noticed us and greeted us with a pleasant smile. We will definitely be back again. Thank you staff for maintaining the environment as well as the guest.

Is it a pleasant place to visit with the family on Saturday night? No cooking on a weekend day. The location was located within a short distance of the house. We received good service. I enjoyed the food. The money was worth the admission price. This is a great spot to hang out with friends or family and grab a quick bite or dinner, and I highly recommend it. The customer service provided by Chasity was exceptional and she was very attentive.
